```{r, include=FALSE}

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")
df <- dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_timespent_ficard_gang_stop") 

chart <- fx_itemchart(
    df=df, 
    x="stop_result_simple",
    y="duration_rate", 
    group_colors=group_colors_item,
    # row_nums=5, # integer
    top_finding="Officers assigned to Gang Enforcement spend nearly 20% of their time on stops resulting in a field interview card",
    subtitle= "The number of hours officers assigned to Gang Enforcement spent on officer-initiated stops by stop result",
    tooltip_text="Out of 100 hours, LBPD officers with the Gang Enforcement assignment spent <b>{point.duration_rate:.1f}</b> hours on officer-initiated stops that resulted in <b>{point.stop_result_simple}</b>",
    legend_text="Single dot represents 1 hour out of 100 hours",
    caption = paste0(sourcenote," Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by the Gang Enforcement assignment"))    

dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)
```
